website_summaries.verdict: Built to have an aggressive style and an ultra-fast performance on the tracks, the Under Armour Kick Sprint boasts reliable and supportive components. When it comes to a lightweight, durable, and grippy running experience, the Kick Sprint will surely not disappoint. Experience all these features from Under Armour’s Kick Sprint at a reasonable price.
pros: Many laud the excellent grip of the Under Armour Kick Sprint on track surfaces
Quite a few appreciate its lightweight construction
A lot of the customers claim that it is a reliable sprint spike
Several of the athletes state that it fits great
Some of the runners commend the durability of the shoe
cons: It feels a little too tight, remarked a few customers
A disappointed buyer states that it causes some discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Great track shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My son has large size, wide feet for an indoor track runner. These fit snugly, as would be expected for running, but accommodate a wide foot. Seem durable after 2 months steady use. Nice looking, too!
customer_reviews.author: Trustme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes for great. My son is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. She normally wears a women’s 8.5 or 9 shoe. We bought a men’s 7.5 and they fit great. Needs to broke in a little bit otherwise they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rusk2g

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: We had to re order this shoes because the first time a spike was missing. Besides that the shoes are very nice, comfortable, nice quality .
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover

customer_reviews.title: it was a perfect bright orange tone
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. I was concerned that the color wouldbe a pinkish red, it was a perfect bright orange tone.
customer_reviews.author: Cocomotive

customer_reviews.title: Good for track
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for track! Fit as expected and you can order new spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Bakermama

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you break them in good.
customer_reviews.text: They were hard to brack in. Other than that, great shoes. We placed first in the pacific Far East tournament. Camp Humpherys brought home tree banders.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wratee

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Mom son loves these for track. He’s a sprinter and says they fit well when running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, I'm not saying it is the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son. He is a freshman in high school and on the track team. He turned I. A 20 second 200 and 52 400. Not bad, I'm not saying it is the shoes, I'm just bragging on my son. He likes them and in his words "they're ok" so I'm not sure if they are the most uncomfortable things he's ever put on his feet or what. He's a teenager so I'm could mean a thousand different things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed more comfort like insert padding for the runner a little uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: They were great in look , size, and performance. But could of had more comfort like insert padding for the running but overall decent besides that factor
customer_reviews.author: Erin Vakalis

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product overall and it arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product overall and it arrived on time. I purchased it for my son and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Y.mYvonne murray

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shoe runs large with wide toe. Son wore them once thinking he could tighten them but it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Laxson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, missing spikes
customer_reviews.text: This shipped in a bag that had holes in it and had spikes missing from inside.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product material is well worth it. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the rubber spikes at the back of the sole.
customer_reviews.author: this is cool

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but were a bit narrow. Seem to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Danen Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Running Shoes missing spikes
customer_reviews.text: The spike running shoes only came with 5 spikes and need12.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Underwood

customer_reviews.title: ... these shoes having my doubts but these shoes are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes having my doubts but these shoes are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend.  And arrived when they were supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: He loves the look of them and they fit him great! No problems or issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Kick Sprint Spike Running Shoe, White (100)/Black, 13
product_meta.description: Lightweight synthetic upper with bold 3D printed graphics Ballistic mesh heel counter adds durable support & breathability Perforated toe box increases ventilation ¾ Length Pebax cleat plate is ultra-strong, flexible &lightweight for explosive propulsion Removable 6-pin track spike outsole construction gives you perfect traction to accelerate & maintain top speeds ¼" pyramid spikes Weight: 5.95 oz.
feature_bullets: Lightweight synthetic upper with bold 3D printed graphics
Ballistic mesh heel counter adds durable support & breathability
¾ Length Pebax cleat plate is ultra strong, flexible &lightweight for explosive propulsion
Removable 6 pin track spike outsole construction gives you perfect traction to accelerate & maintain top speeds
